item.title: Debug in Hugo
item.description: While building this website I needed to understand a bit more about the internals and its variables. Even though Hugo’s documentation about debugging is pretty “okay”, there are a lot of attributes that are really hard to figure out, specially if you can’t see them on the documentation. So I started to look online for something to help me out debugging Hugo templates and the usual 3 options were: üñ® printing the dot on Hugo’s templates üìù console.
